full_summary:
Government Tender Announcement: Request for Proposal (RFP) for Forensic Workstations for Royal Canadian Mounted Police [2BH2125266/A]
==============================================

### Solicitation Details

* Solicitation Number: 2BH2125266/A
* Department: Royal Canadian Mounted Police
* Notification Period: 14 days (December 21, 2022, to January 3, 2023)
* Description of Requirement: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police requires 12 Forensic workstations and 15 Client Options. The systems are being solicited as a generic specification.
* Delivery Destination: Surrey, BC
* Delivery Date: All Firm Deliverables must be received no later than 45 federal government working days from Contract award or before March 31st, 2023, whichever is earliest.

### Solicitation Details (French)

* Numéro de sollicitation : 2BH2125266/A
* ministère : Gendarmerie royale du Canada
* Période de notification : 14 jours (21 décembre 2022 à 03 janvier 2023)
* Description de la demande : La Gendarmerie royale du Canada a un besoin de 12 postes de travail judiciaires et 15 options spécifiques au client.
* Lieu de livraison : Surrey, RDPC
* Date de livraison : Les produits livrés fermes doivent être reçus au plus tard 45 jours ouvrables du gouvernement fédéral à compter de l’attribution du contrat ou au plus tard le 31 mars 2023.

### Security Requirements

* N/A

### Trade Agreements

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

### Contact Information

* Procurement Officer: Colin McKennirey
* Email: <colin.mckennirey@ssc-spc.gc.ca>
* Telephone: 343-572-8718
